metadata.title: Sure2Sleep Monterey Cal King 10-inch Med Firm Mattress. Made in USA. Fiberglass Free. Breathable HyPUR-Gel Sleeps Cool. CertiPUR-US
features: ✅ Comfort and quality are top priorities for many mattress shoppers, and a high-density foam mattress can give you both. If you're looking for a durable, comfortable mattress that won't wear down over time, then ours is the perfect choice - every foam mattress we make is made with high-density foams that are produced right here in the USA! Compare our product weight to other companies and see the difference in quality yourself!

✅ If you're looking for a good quality mattress that is free of fiberglass, you need to look no further than the Monterey Mattress. With the Monterey Mattress, you don't have to worry about your skin becoming irritated by fiberglass as its specially designed knit fire sock provides protection without sacrificing comfort. The Monterey Mattress is perfect for those with allergies or asthma who are concerned about the health implications of fiberglass exposure in mattresses.

✅ If you're looking for a mattress that not only provides a stylish look but also maximum comfort and support, then you won't be disappointed with this one. It features a HyPUR-gel TOP LAYER which evenly distributes your body weight to reduce pressure points - ensuring that no matter what your sleeping position is, you can get the restful sleep you deserve. Countless people swear by this mattress - try it today and experience the ultimate level of comfort and luxury.

✅ The Sure2Sleep Monterey mattress is designed with you in mind. Backed by a 10-year warranty, this mattress provides lasting comfort and support for years to come. Adding peace of mind to the purchase, we also offer a 30-night money back sleep trial. If for any reason you’re not satisfied, you can return the mattress within 30 days for your full purchase price. Proudly made in the USA, you can rest assured that your new mattress has been created from only the best quality materials.
✅ The Cal King mattress measures 10 x 72 x 84 inches and weighs 90 pounds. It comes compressed and rolled up in an easy to transport box and is shipped to your door. It is easy to set up.
description: The Sure2Sleep Monterey Mattress is the premium mattress you’ve been searching for. Crafted with premium foam sourced in the USA and built with a solid base layer for stability, this mattress offers the comfort and support necessary for long-term performance. To top it off, our proprietary HyPUR-Gel memory foam gives you a cool and comfortable sleeping experience no matter your favorite position. Furthermore, the mattress is wrapped in an innovative fiberglass free fire sock which adds to its enhanced protection and plush feel. And let's not forget about its premium cover, whose 400 denier luxurious knit fabric will provide you with great sleep in an equally great style. Step up your sleep game with the Sure2Sleep Monterey Mattress.
